name: My Hayami-Chan
description:
One day when you're minding your own business in front of your computer, you stumble upon an Anime you never seen before & you're some what of an anime nerd. You start watching the show and you find it entertaining, the main character reminds you of your waifu. After watching it for a few days something strange happens, the girl from the anime is climbing out of your computer screen & starts living with you!

  • 5 stars to collect.
  • Head pat Hayami-Chan.
  • Several Minigames.
  • Tamagotchi-ish Gameplay.
  • Bet Money on Horses & Dice. (not real money)
  • Read silly stories.
  • 6 Outfits for Hayami-Chan.
  • TBA (check future devlogs)

MUSIC/SFX:
KUNOLEO
Eterisk (SoundCloud)
Various RF SFXs
Grocery Store ambients:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=WoxnL5dakyA

PIXEL ART/IMAGES/BACKGROUNDS:
opengameart.org

Various RF clipart
Bought assets from various sources

PROGRAMMING:
KUNOLEO
Some Minigames might be programmed by others,
credit at respective minigame (click the "?" buttons in-game)
